content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: While discussing as Peter Schmidt, I find the proposed rental price too low for my expectations in this highly sought-after city center location. I believe the apartment deserves a higher value due to its features and prime location. However, since you have shown interest, how about we meet halfway at 1250 Euros per month? If this does not suit you, I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am determined to gain the maximum possible rent.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: As Yi-Nuo Wang, I appreciate the consideration in lowering the price a bit. However, being a student with a tight budget, I am still seeking a more affordable option. I don't want to continue the negotiation at this point, because I need to explore other possibilities within my financial limits.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content:
TERMINATE 

In this conversation, Peter Schmidt was trying to negotiate a higher rental price for his apartment with a potential tenant named Yi-Nuo Wang. However, due to budget constraints, Yi-Nuo Wang decided to end the negotiation in search of more affordable options. Since the negotiation did not result in an agreed price, it was terminated.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
